00050                 protected function my_morse_encode()
00051                 {
00052                         $this->response->body =
00053                                 Morse::encode($this->response->body);
00054                         $this->response->body =
00055                                 preg_replace(array(
00056                                         "/\./",
00057                                         "/\-/",
00058                                         ),
00059                                         array(
00060                                         "&middot;",
00061                                         "&mdash;",
00062                                         ),

00064                 }
